lyric:
[00:00.000]Lookin' at the cop in the rear view mirror,
[00:02.720]probably shoulda' stopped but the crosswalk was clear
[00:05.540]I'll just imagine it's a ticket to a Broadway show.
[00:10.810]Lookin' at the clouds and they seem kinda funny,
[00:13.890]probably gonna rain but my outlook is sunny,
[00:16.590]I'll just imagine that I'm layin' out in Mexico.
[00:21.280]'Cause I know that pleasures gotta come with pain,
[00:25.200]and I know that things won't always go my way
[00:27.920]and I know life is gonna suck some days.
[00:32.180]But I can't complain,
[00:34.540]I can't complain
[00:38.440]Every day's too short to let it go to waste.
[00:43.190]And I can't complain,
[00:45.960]I can't complain.
[00:48.800]You gotta treat every day like a holiday.
[00:53.680]And I'm tellin' you that I know some days I'm gonna stumble,
[00:58.070]and I know the cookie's gonna crumble,
[01:01.030]and I know life is gonna suck some days, but I can't complain.
[01:08.760]Waitin' on a never ending train at the crossing,
[01:11.700]payin' it no mind 'cause you just keep on talkin',
[01:14.560]We'll just imagine it's the good old days and take it slow.
[01:19.940]Spending Christmas eve on the floor at the airport,
[01:22.580]dying to get back to the people that I care for,
[01:25.340]smile and just dream about my puppy in my bed back home.
[01:30.910]'Cause I know that pleasures gotta come with pain,
[01:33.930]and I know that things won't always go my way
[01:36.680]and I know life is gonna suck some days.
[01:41.240]But I can't complain,
[01:43.980]I can't complain
[01:46.710]Every day's too short to let it go to waste.
[01:52.080]And I can't complain,
[01:54.580]I can't complain.
[01:57.990]You gotta treat every day like a holiday.
[02:02.800]And I'm tellin' you that I know some days I'm gonna stumble,
[02:06.860]and I know the cookie's gonna crumble,
[02:09.820]and I know life is gonna suck some days,
[02:14.630]If you can't say nothin' good don't say nothin'
[02:17.450]If you stop to think you could come up with somethin'
[02:20.360]That makes you feel so good when time's are rough it's okay.
[02:25.310]I can't complain (Oh oh oh oh oh x2)
[02:32.990]Don't let it go to waste...
[02:36.400]Now I can't complain (I can't complain)
[02:39.050]I can't complain (I can't complain)
[02:41.420]Every day's too short to let it go to waste.
[02:46.870]Now I can't complain (I can't complain)
[02:49.780]I can't complain (I can't complain)
[02:53.000]You gotta treat every day like a holiday.
[02:57.650]And I'm tellin' you that I know some days I'm gonna stumble,
[03:01.760]and I know the cookie's gonna crumble,
[03:04.730]and I know life is gonna suck some days,
[03:09.450]but I can't complain.
tlyric:
[by:三文线]
[00:00.00]从后视镜看向警察
[00:02.72]也许我该停车 但斑马线上没有行人
[00:05.54]我就幻想这是一张百老汇歌舞剧的门票咯
[00:10.81]天上的云彩看着有点滑稽
[00:13.89]也许要下雨了但我相信会阳光明媚的
[00:16.59]我就幻想自己在墨西哥咯
[00:21.28]因为我知欢愉总是伴随着疼痛
[00:25.20]我知事情不会常如我所愿
[00:27.92]我知生活有时会糟糕透顶
[00:32.18]但我不能抱怨
[00:34.54]我不能抱怨
[00:38.44]时光荏苒 不容虚度
[00:43.19]我不能抱怨
[00:45.96]我不能抱怨
[00:48.80]你要将每日都当做假期度过
[00:53.68]我来告诉你 我知道有时自己会跌撞前行
[00:58.07]我知道有时饼干会碎成渣渣
[01:01.03]我知道有时生活会糟糕透顶，但我不能抱怨
[01:08.76]在交叉口等待一辆永不终结的列车

[01:22.58]一心想回到牵挂的人身边
